author: kameshj
msg: As a first attempt to refactor 230 lines of code.
(get_mergeinfo_paths): Localize the scope of 'parent' to where it is used.

author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r26513 fixing a compiler warning.
(open_root): Pass expected data type to output parameter of svn_wc_entry().

author: ehu
msg: (with some code cleanup and pool use fixes to show their value).
svn_iter_apr_hash): New.  Hash iterator driver and callback prototype.
svn_iter_apr_array): New.  Array iterator driver and callback prototype.
(svn_iter_break): New.  Macro to break out of the iteration drive.
(SVN_ERR_ITER_BREAK): New.  Error code used to signal end-of-iteration
from the iteration callback to the driver.
(log_do_committed): Use svn_iter_apr_hash() to iterate over entries,
fixing a pool use bug [there's no iterpool in the original code].
post_process_commit_item): Post commit processing factored out of
svn_client_commit4() to eliminate confusing pool use.
lock_dirs_for_commit): adm_access locking factored out of
eliminating pool use bug [the original doesn't have an iterpool].
eliminating pool use bug [the original doesn't have an iterpool].
check_nonrecursive_dir_delete() using the new iterator drivers.
(svn_client__harvest_committables): ... this which now drives it via
(svn_client__get_copy_committables): ... this which now drives it via
[Note: This description of the changes to commit_util.c was missing from
the original log message and added much later, and does not try to
identify any pool usage changes or other reasons for this change.]
